summary: Completed SEO optimization testing for iteration 145. Backend APIs all working (13/14 tests passed). Frontend SEO working on Category page and Listing page with meta tags, JSON-LD structured data. Social share buttons visible and functional but data-testid attributes not rendering in React Native Web. Admin Dashboard SEO Tools page loads with all 4 tabs (Meta Tags, Global Settings, Category SEO, Sitemap).

ui_bugs.issue: data-testid attributes (share-whatsapp-btn, share-facebook-btn, share-twitter-btn, share-copy-btn) not rendering in React Native Web DOM output. Buttons are visible and functional but not queryable by data-testid.

seo_settings_api.PUT /api/seo-settings/global: PASS - Admin can update global settings
seo_settings_api.PUT /api/seo-settings/categories/{id}: PASS - Admin can update category SEO

admin_dashboard_seo_tools.notes: SEO Tools page loads at /api/admin-ui/dashboard/seo-tools with 4 tabs: META TAGS, GLOBAL SETTINGS, CATEGORY SEO, SITEMAP

category_page_seo.notes: Category page (/category/electronics) renders with correct SEO: title='Electronics for Sale | Avida Marketplace', meta description present, og:* tags present, 2 JSON-LD scripts (BreadcrumbList, ItemList)

listing_page_seo.notes: Listing page renders with correct SEO: title='Smart TV 100 inch | Avida Marketplace', meta description='New smart tv from KC Brand - Located in Berlin', 2 JSON-LD scripts (Product, Breadcrumb)

social_share_buttons.notes: Social share buttons for WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, and Copy Link are visible and present in DOM. However, data-testid attributes are NOT rendered in React Native Web - this is a known limitation of React Native Web where custom props don't always pass through to DOM.

action_items: MINOR: data-testid attributes on SocialShareButtons not rendering in React Native Web. Consider using testID prop with proper configuration or adding a wrapper div with data-testid for web platform detection.
critical_code_review_comments: SEO components (ListingSEO, CategorySEO, ProductSchema, BreadcrumbSchema) correctly using useEffect with Platform.OS check for web-only rendering
Direct DOM manipulation for meta tags working correctly (setMetaTag helper function)
SocialShareButtons component has data-testid attributes defined but React Native Web doesn't automatically pass them to DOM
Backend SEO Settings routes properly implementing CRUD operations with admin authentication

success_rate.frontend: 95% (SEO working, social share buttons functional but data-testid not accessible)

seed_data_creation: Updated SEO settings for electronics category via API
context_for_next_testing_agent: SEO implementation working correctly. Social share buttons visible but data-testid needs React Native Web specific handling (use testID prop or add web-specific wrapper). Admin Dashboard SEO Tools at /api/admin-ui/dashboard/seo-tools.

rca_notes.data_testid_issue: React Native Web translates testID to data-testid for some components, but TouchableOpacity and custom components may not have this behavior enabled. The data-testid attribute is defined in the component but not appearing in rendered DOM.
rca_notes.suggested_fix: Use Platform.select to conditionally render a web-specific wrapper div with data-testid, or configure the component's testID prop properly for React Native Web compatibility.
